definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: All that remains of this building is the " Western Wall, " also known as the "Wailing Wall.
sentences.chinese: 存留至今的聖殿遺蹟只有其西牆，即著名的“哭牆”。

sentences.english: Once they found remains of the cave lion in this cave. So, the cave was named after it.
sentences.chinese: 一發現此洞裏存留的穴獅，這個洞穴就是以此命名的。

sentences.english: Flanging, easy flow and the resistance caused by impurities hold, the brass has corrosive effect.
sentences.chinese: 內翻邊，易造成阻流及雜質存留，對銅管有腐蝕作用。

sentences.english: Is it enough to have survived for a long time ?
sentences.chinese: 存留很長時間就足夠了嗎？

sentences.english: This means that stale air lingers in the bottom of our lungs.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着渾濁的空氣老是存留在肺的底部。

sentences.english: How many lusts do i have in your love bank?
sentences.chinese: 在你的愛巢裏有我多少存留？

sentences.english: When the day waned and it darkened, I found that the flower had faded, but the pain remained.
sentences.chinese: 日光漸暗，我發現花兒凋謝了，痛苦卻存留着。

sentences.english: "They had very vivid and very specific memories, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “他們都還存留有非常生動和具體的記憶”。

sentences.english: And once lead gets into the soil, it stays a long time.
sentences.chinese: 一旦進入土壤，鉛會存留很長時間。

sentences.english: Continued economic problems may intensify resentment of the Beltway fat cats.
sentences.chinese: 存留的經濟問題或可加劇華府政治權貴對他的嫌怨。

sentences.english: I touched the tree of heaven by hand and the smell lingered for quite a long time.
sentences.chinese: 用手摸了一下臭大姐，手上的味道存留了好長時間。
質疑問難，解決學生的存留問題。

sentences.english: He wants to be the one in whom " we live and move and have our being."
sentences.chinese: 他切盼“我們生活，動作，存留，都在乎他。”

sentences.english: Yet the ‘right’ of these countries to keep them is arguable.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這些國家存留他們的“權力”是有爭議的。

sentences.english: "There remaineth, therefore, a rest to the people of God" (Heb.4:9)
sentences.chinese: 這樣看來，必另有一安息，爲神的子民存留。

sentences.english: Black was the shadow of yourself, tacking a little silence left.
sentences.chinese: 黑色如影隨形，追逐着存留不多得沉默。

definition: to keep/to preserve/extant/to remain (from the past)
to hold in storage/to retain/to harbor (feelings)/to entertain (sentiments)/(of abstract things) to exist/there is
to conserve/to preserve/to keep/to save (a file etc) (computing)
to keep/to retain/to have reservations (about sth)/to hold back (from saying sth)/to put aside for later
to clear away/to eliminate/to get rid of
